Headline: 63rd-bound Green Line Service Delayed at Cermak
ShortDescription: 63rd-bound Green Line trains are standing at Cermak due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
63rd-bound Green Line trains are standing at Cermak due to a sick customer. 

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

#21 Cermak

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
